question: Recently, European Investment Bank and ___________ announcing a co-finance programme of $400-million for renewable power generation in India.
explanation: YES Bank and the European Investment Bank (EIB) have released a joint statement announcing a co-finance programme of $400-million for renewable power generation in India. Under this programme, both the entities will co-finance a range of renewable energy projects being built and operated by leading Indian companies and private sector developers. Yes bank will fund $200 million while another $200 million will be supported by EIB.
